alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Pocahontas; Sac (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued May 13 at 4:57PM CDT until May 13 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southwestern Pocahontas County in northwestern Iowa... Northeastern Sac County in west central Iowa... Northwestern Calhoun County in west central Iowa... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 456 PM CDT, a confirmed tornado was located 3 miles south of Fonda, or 10 miles northeast of Sac City, and is moving northeast at 5 MPH. HAZARD...Damaging tornado. SOURCE...Law enforcement confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Fonda. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
